en-US.title: Cribnosh
en-US.subtitle: Order meals from local food creators
en-US.description: Cribnosh connects you with local food creators and Food creators in your area. Discover delicious homemade meals, order from your favorite food creators, and have fresh food delivered to your door. Support local culinary talent and enjoy authentic, home-cooked meals.
